function.description:
Modifies an existing document in a collection. The method can modify specific fields of an existing document or replace an existing document entirely, depending on the update parameter. Returns `true` if a document was updated, otherwise `false`.
The `options` parameter may contain the following option:
| Option | Description | | -------- | ----------- | | `upsert` | If set to `true`, creates a new document if no document matches the query, or if a document matches the query, performs an update. The default is `false`. |
